ISSUE.TITLE: Caching Bug
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: Latest Dev Steps to reproduce the problem: Install and run the app. Navigate back and forth to some categories and products. Just installed the latest dev version. No settings altered. As installed System.NullReferenceException HResult=0x80004003 Message=Object reference not set to an instance of an object. Source=Nop.Core StackTrace: at Nop.Core.Caching.MemoryCacheManager.RemoveByPrefixAsync(String prefix, Object[] prefixParameters) in C:\Streamzy\Working Source\src\Libraries\Nop.Core\Caching\MemoryCacheManager.cs:line 189 at Nop.Web.Infrastructure.Cache.ModelCacheEventConsumer.<HandleEventAsync>d__32.MoveNext() in C:\Streamzy\Working Source\src\Presentation\Nop.Web\Infrastructure\Cache\ModelCacheEventConsumer.cs:line 394 at Nop.Services.Events.EventPublisher.<PublishAsync>d__0`1.MoveNext() in C:\Streamzy\Working Source\src\Libraries\Nop.Services\Events\EventPublisher.cs:line 33 This exception was originally thrown at this call stack: Nop.Core.Caching.MemoryCacheManager.RemoveByPrefixAsync(string, object[]) in MemoryCacheManager.cs Nop.Web.Infrastructure.Cache.ModelCacheEventConsumer.HandleEventAsync(Nop.Core.Events.EntityUpdatedEvent<Nop.Core.Domain.Media.Picture>) in ModelCacheEventConsumer.cs Nop.Services.Events.EventPublisher.PublishAsync<TEvent>(TEvent) in EventPublisher.cs
